Block_reason: Safety concerns trigger an urgent recall of specific product batches to ensure consumer safety.
Solution: [{"Instruction_step": 1, "Instruction": "Identify and document the affected product batches.", "ResponsibleDepartment": "Quality Assurance"}, {"Instruction_step": 2, "Instruction": "Issue a recall notice and communicate with customers and regulatory bodies.", "ResponsibleDepartment": "Public Relations"}, {"Instruction_step": 3, "Instruction": "Arrange for the return or disposal of the recalled products.", "ResponsibleDepartment": "Logistics"}, {"Instruction_step": 4, "Instruction": "Investigate the cause of the safety issue and implement corrective measures.", "ResponsibleDepartment": "Product Development"}, {"Instruction_step": 1, "Instruction": "Initiate recall procedure and notify affected parties.", "ResponsibleDepartment": "Quality Assurance"}, {"Instruction_step": 2, "Instruction": "Identify and isolate the affected product batches.", "ResponsibleDepartment": "Warehouse Management"}, {"Instruction_step": 3, "Instruction": "Communicate with customers for product return or disposal.", "ResponsibleDepartment": "Customer Service"}]
Solution_KR: [{"Instruction_step": 1, "Instruction_KR": "영향을 받은 제품 배치를 식별하고 문서화하십시오.", "ResponsibleDepartment_KR": "품질 관리"}, {"Instruction_step": 2, "Instruction_KR": "리콜 공지를 발행하고 고객 및 규제 기관과 소통하십시오.", "ResponsibleDepartment_KR": "공공 관계"}, {"Instruction_step": 3, "Instruction_KR": "리콜된 제품의 반품 또는 폐기를 준비하십시오.", "ResponsibleDepartment_KR": "물류"}, {"Instruction_step": 4, "Instruction_KR": "안전 문제의 원인을 조사하고 수정 조치를 시행하십시오.", "ResponsibleDepartment_KR": "제품 개발 (Product Development)"}, {"Instruction_step": 1, "Instruction_KR": "리콜 절차를 시작하고 영향을 받는 당사자에게 알리십시오.", "ResponsibleDepartment_KR": "품질 관리"}, {"Instruction_step": 2, "Instruction_KR": "영향을 받은 제품 배치를 식별하고 격리하십시오.", "ResponsibleDepartment_KR": "창고 관리"}, {"Instruction_step": 3, "Instruction_KR": "제품 반품 또는 폐기를 위해 고객과 소통하십시오.", "ResponsibleDepartment_KR": "고객 서비스"}]
Block_reason_KR: 안전 문제로 특정 제품 배치에 대한 긴급 리콜이 발생하여 소비자의 안전을 보장합니다.

Block_reason: Identification of packaging defects that compromise product integrity before shipment, necessitating immediate corrective measures.
Solution: [{"Instruction_step": 1, "Instruction": "Conduct a comprehensive review of the current packaging process to identify the defect.", "ResponsibleDepartment": "Quality Assurance"}, {"Instruction_step": 2, "Instruction": "Implement immediate corrective measures to address the identified packaging defects.", "ResponsibleDepartment": "Production"}, {"Instruction_step": 3, "Instruction": "Reevaluate packaging materials and suppliers to ensure higher quality standards.", "ResponsibleDepartment": "Procurement"}, {"Instruction_step": 4, "Instruction": "Train staff on new packaging protocols to prevent future defects.", "ResponsibleDepartment": "Human Resources"}, {"Instruction_step": 5, "Instruction": "Institute regular packaging audits for ongoing quality assurance.", "ResponsibleDepartment": "Quality Control"}]
Solution_KR: [{"Instruction_step": 1, "Instruction_KR": "현재의 포장 과정에 대한 종합적인 검토를 실시하여 결함을 확인하십시오.", "ResponsibleDepartment_KR": "품질관리"}, {"Instruction_step": 2, "Instruction_KR": "식별된 포장 결함을 해결하기 위해 즉각적인 수정 조치를 시행하십시오.", "ResponsibleDepartment_KR": "생산"}, {"Instruction_step": 3, "Instruction_KR": "더 높은 품질 표준을 보장하기 위해 포장재와 공급업체를 재평가하십시오.", "ResponsibleDepartment_KR": "구매조달"}, {"Instruction_step": 4, "Instruction_KR": "미래의 결함을 방지하기 위해 새로운 포장 프로토콜에 대해 직원들을 교육하십시오.", "ResponsibleDepartment_KR": "인사관리"}, {"Instruction_step": 5, "Instruction_KR": "지속적인 품질 보증을 위해 정기적인 포장 감사를 실시하십시오.", "ResponsibleDepartment_KR": "품질관리"}]
Block_reason_KR: 출하 전에 제품의 무결성을 저해하는 포장 결함을 식별하여 즉각적인 시정 조치가 필요합니다.
